snippet: The ousting of the Viacom executives Philippe Dauman and George Abrams from Sumner Redstone’s trust would have happened regardless of Mr. Redstone’s competency, his lawyers said.
abstract: Lawyers for ailing media mogul Sumner M Redstone argue in court that his competency is irrelevant in dispute over his $40 billion empire; say ousting of Viacom chairman and chief Philippe P Dauman and director George S Abrams would have happened anyway.
lead_paragraph: The ousting of the Viacom executives Philippe Dauman and George Abrams from Sumner Redstone’s trust would have happened regardless of Mr. Redstone’s competency, his lawyers said.

headline.main: Redstone’s Lawyers Argue That His Mental Health Is Irrelevant in Dispute
headline.print_headline: Redstone’s Lawyers Claim His Competency Is Irrelevant
